item.title: Premium Arabica Blend
item.description: Rich, full-bodied coffee with notes of chocolate and caramel
item.content:encoded: Our Premium Arabica Blend is carefully crafted from the finest beans sourced from high-altitude regions. With its rich, full-bodied taste and notes of chocolate and caramel, this coffee delivers an exceptional experience in every cup.

item.title: Ethiopian Single Origin
item.description: Bright, floral coffee with citrus undertones
item.content:encoded: Experience the unique flavors of Ethiopian coffee with our single origin selection. This bright, floral coffee features distinctive citrus undertones and a clean finish that coffee enthusiasts love.

item.title: About Us
item.content:encoded: Welcome to our coffee shop! We are passionate about bringing you the finest coffee from around the world. Our journey began with a simple mission: to share exceptional coffee experiences with fellow coffee lovers.

item.title: Contact
item.content:encoded:
Get in touch with us! We'd love to hear from you.
Address: 123 Coffee Street, City, State 12345 Phone: (555) 123-4567 Email: info@coffeeshop.com
